name: Clayton
placeOfBirth: Michelleborough, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S)
description: Clayton is a blue-eyed llama with brown hair, standing 199 cm tall. Originally from Michelleborough, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S), Clayton enjoys reading, wood carving, gardening. Known for their calm and playful personality, Clayton is a beloved member of the llama community.
